ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: It s insanity.  I have a DE Necro who has to con *everything* from a distance.
ygData.messageBody:
It's insanity. I have a DE Necro who has to con *everything* from a distance.

On Fri, Apr 28, 2000 at 08:21:01AM -0500, ug@... wrote:
> Thom Green writes:
>
> > The negitive is that they are hated by every other race in the
> > world. Try going to Unrest at 20th or so to collect some of that FS
> > or bronze and hoard it up till you are twice over your weight limit
> > as an Iksar, then, try to find a merchant to sell it too who wont
> > kill you on sight.
>
> I could be on crack here, but I thought they made merchants dubious
> (at worst) to everyone.
>
> So if you just waltz by them, it's OK. And they certainly won't sell
> to you if that's the case.
>
> I found that my troll who used to be KOS to some merchants still can't
> sell to/from them, but they don't attack, and I don't THINK I did
> anything to fix faction with them.
>
> Or am i insane again?
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Now the best and coolest websites come right to you based on your
> unique interests. eTour.com is surfing without searching.
> And, it's FREE!
> http://click.egroups.com/1/3013/7/_/541798/_/956928097/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
